{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$277.1K in 2021-2022** on contracts with THE KTL GROUP.

Across 35 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 17 have at least one amendment (49%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 102% and the average number of amendments was 1.94. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.1M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$210.4K. The longest contract was 3.36 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
